desc: We run a small entertainment business in Sydney, Australia. People book online and then come as a group to our venue for the experience. Our current organic search rankings are poor, and we're sure we can improve with some help - that's where you come in! We're looking to get someone to do the initial work, and then to retain them on a monthly basis to keep the SEO in good shape. Our website is fairly simple, being just three pages - a landing page, a booking page, and a blog page.So we're looking for an SEO expert who:- Understands that we are targeting local customers, and will act on that- Is proficient using Wordpress- Will give a comprehensive service, from assessment of what we can improve, to making those improvements, to providing any other advice/recommendations- Will run things past us (in particular content changes) to get our approval before proceeding with the work- Will bid not only for the upfront work (number of hours x hourly rate) but also give us a monthly price for ongoing work- Can give us an honest and open assessment of what improvement they think they can make for us. We don't expect overnight miracles.- Communicates well in fluent English.We can provide our web address to interested bidders.
title: SEO for my website - 3 months initially, then ongoing

We will also ship Free ProxiFy beacons to you for promoting your personal business.Note that this is a friendly offer and is not meant to replace your primarily job or business. The sole aim of this is to get people around the world learn about the newly launched ProxiFy platform and Proximity marketing as a new simple effective way to advertise.- All potential associates that find the new Tech interesting are welcome in advance- Please ignore this invitation if your intention is to get back to us and introduce a different service in any form.Will be glad to hear from you.
